publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3383.2 Andy Kerr: Borrowing Powers for the Scottish Parliament—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3383) in the name of Tavish Scott, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "welcomes the examination of the use of borrowing powers by all the parties and the Scottish Government’s willingness to engage with the Commission on Scottish Devolution."
